# Question

Write a function `wrap_string`. It iterates over words and it will add a new line each time a maximum `text_width::Int=10` would be exceeded. Provide an example

```julia
function wrap_string(str::AbstractString, text_width::Int = 10)
    lines = String[]
    current_line = ""
    for word in split(str)
        if length(current_line * word) > text_width
            push!(lines, current_line)
            current_line = word
        else
            current_line *= " " * word
        end
    end
    push!(lines, current_line)
    return join(lines, "\n")
end
```

Example usage:
```julia
julia> wrap_string("Hello World This is a long string that should be wrapped at 10 characters per line.")
"Hello World
This is a long string that should be wrapped at 10 characters per line."
```
